metadata.title: Custom Logic Apps Connector - ShadowByte Aria
metadata.description: Exposes a few operations allowing to connect to ShadowByte's Aria API.
prerequisites: 1. Generate an API key by going into [ShadowByte Aria's Settings](https://app.ariaintel.io/user-preferences/settings).

parameters.description: Search criteria
parameters.name: searchType

parameters.description: Search term for querying the database
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Breaches not to include in the search results
parameters.name: excludedBreaches

parameters.description: Include marketing data
parameters.name: marketingData

parameters.description: Perform a fuzzy search
parameters.name: fuzzySearch

parameters.description: Return results created after a given date in YYYY:MM:DD HH:MM:SS format
parameters.name: dateFrom

parameters.description: Return results created before a given date in YYYY:MM:DD HH:MM:SS format
parameters.name: dateTo

parameters.description: Search results offset. Only the results after the given number (position) will be returned.
parameters.name: start

parameters.description: Search results length. How many results to return.

parameters.description: Search term. Searches author name to get forum list for that author. You can also search like `data AND aria` to search 2 words.
